ground_truth: It will be necessary to define what shall be deemed
Desertion, distinguishing it from the case of lawful Absence;
and what steps shall be taken for giving notice.
transcription: It will be necessary to define what shall be deemed Desertion, distinguishing it from the case of lawful absence; and what steps shall be taken for giving notice.

ground_truth: Let certain methods be established whereby the Husband
and the Wife may be enabled and obliged to correspond with
transcription: Let certain methods be established whereby the Husband and the Wife may be enabled and obliged to correspond with one another at stated intervals: and let a failure on either part for a certain time be deemed presumptive evidence of death or this desertion. Within the dominions of the state this might be managed in the manner mentioned in the Book of Procedure. (sic)

ground_truth: one another at stated intervals: and let a failure on either part
for a certain time be deemed presumptive evidence of death or
transcription: As to foreigners, upon their coming into the country, let them be obliged to declare upon oath whether they are married or single: and if single whether Bachelors or Spinsters, Widowers or Widows. Of these declarations let Registers be kept, of which previous to their being married, copies should be required to be produced. If married, certificates of the death of the Wife or Husband. At present these important enquiries are left to the uncertain prudence of individuals. The declarations above mentioned should be accompanied with some details respecting their birth, parentage and last abode, such as may lead to detection in
